name: Secret of the Lost Island Labyrinth
name_original: Secret of the Lost Island Labyrinth
description:
This maze/puzzle game will transport players to a mysterious island, where they will take on the role of an explorer who finds themselves trapped within the ruins of a labyrinth. Beyond the disconcerting twists and turns of the maze, there will be additional obstacles to the player’s progress, so they must use deductive reasoning and pattern recognition to escape from the ruins and unlock the Secret of the Lost Island Labyrinth.

Controls:

WASD = Player Movement

Mouse = Camera Movement

Hint: 

Find the keystones within the maze to open gates of the corresponding color.
